name: Diary
tagline: 心情好的时候唠叨两句  ^_^
body: ### Welcome to zhng Mr hello wolrd ``` http://www.lovezbs.com ``` ### Designer Templates We've crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and continue to layouts to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved if it remained markdown format. ### Want to know me You can send me a email to : lovephp@foxmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
